text: Elizabeth Victoria Montgomery (April 15, 1933â€”May 18, 1995) was an American actress . She acted in movies and television programs. Her father was actor Robert Montgomery. She starred as Samantha Stephens in the sitcom Bewitched. She played Lizzie Borden in The Legend of Lizzie Borden. She had other roles besides these. Montgomery was born in Los Angeles. She died from colorectal cancer in Beverly Hills, California. ==Other websites== Category:Actors from Hollywood Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles County, California Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:1933 births Category:1995 deaths
title: Elizabeth Montgomery
